it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen

Class AbstractVirtualScreen

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.polito.computervision.virtualscreen.AbstractVirtualScreen
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    VirtualScreen
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    FlatVirtualScreen

    public abstract class AbstractVirtualScreen
extends java.lang.Object
implements VirtualScreen
    Implements the common functionality of a VirtualScreen

    giovanni

    • Constructor Detail

      • AbstractVirtualScreen

        public AbstractVirtualScreen()
        Initializes an empty virtual screen. Size and depth are set to illegal values. They will need to be set before using this virtual screen instance.

      • AbstractVirtualScreen

        public AbstractVirtualScreen(org.opencv.core.Size size,
                     float depth)
        Initializes the virtual screen with the given size and depth
        Parameters:
        size - The size of the virtual screen
        depth - The depth of the virtual screen (distance from the sensor)

      • getDepth

        public float getDepth()
        Specified by:
        getDepth in interface VirtualScreen
        Returns:
        the depth of the virtual screen (i.e. its distance from the origin of the world coordinate system (the sensor) along the Z axis)
